languages.text: "Мы зовем их Прячущимися на виду. Ворами родства. Эти отродья Великого пожирателя заставили умолкнуть голоса нескольких анклавов моего народа. Их жалящие укусы воруют души, а их плоть — священные формы более благородных рас. Мерзость!"

"We call them 'the False Among Us.' Pilferers of our bloodlines. These spawn of the Great Devourer silenced the voices of several of my people's enclaves. Their stinging bites steal souls just as their flesh steals the shapes of the nobler races. Abominations!"
languages.original_text: "Мы зовем их Прячущимися на виду. Ворами родства. Эти отродья Великого пожирателя заставили умолкнуть голоса нескольких анклавов моего народа. Их жалящие укусы воруют души, а их плоть — священные формы более благородных рас. Мерзость!"

traits.locale_text: "We cal them 'Ones Hiding In Plain Sight'. Thieves of congeniality. These spawn of the Great Devourer silenced the voices of at least several enclaves of my people. Their stinging bites steal souls just as their flesh steals shapes of the nobler races. Abominations!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We cal them 'Ones Hiding In Plain Sight'. Thieves of congeniality. These spawn of the Great Devourer silenced the voices of at least several enclaves of my people. Their stinging bites steal souls just as their flesh steals shapes of the nobler races. Abominations!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We call them 'the False Among Us.' Pilferers of our bloodlines. These spawn of the Great Devourer silenced the voices of several of my people's enclaves. Their stinging bites steal souls just as their flesh steals the shapes of the nobler races. Abominations!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We call them 'the False Among Us.' Pilferers of our bloodlines. These spawn of the Great Devourer silenced the voices of several of my people's enclaves. Their stinging bites steal souls just as their flesh steals the shapes of the nobler races. Abominations!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Nous les surnommons "les usurpateurs". Les détrousseurs de nos lignées. Ces engeances du Grand Dévoreur ont réduit au silence plusieurs enclaves appartenant à mes semblables. Leur morsure empoisonnée dérobe les âmes aussi sûrement qu'elles s'approprient l'enveloppe charnelle des races autrement plus nobles. Ce sont des abominations ! »
languages.original_text: "We call them 'the False Among Us.' Pilferers of our bloodlines. These spawn of the Great Devourer silenced the voices of several of my people's enclaves. Their stinging bites steal souls just as their flesh steals the shapes of the nobler races. Abominations!"

traits.locale_text: « Nous les surnommons "les usurpateurs". Les détrousseurs de nos lignées. Ces engeances du Grand Dévoreur ont réduit au silence plusieurs enclaves appartenant à mes semblables. Leur morsure empoisonnée dérobe les âmes aussi sûrement qu'elles s'approprient l'enveloppe charnelle des races autrement plus nobles. Ce sont des abominations ! »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我们称它们为‘伪型’，它们会掠夺我们的血脉。那些大吞噬者的后裔，已经让我们好几个族群永远陷入沉寂之中。它们刺痛的啃咬会窃取灵魂，而它们邪恶的躯体会拟态成高贵种族的外形。真是一群令人作呕的怪物！”
languages.original_text: "We call them 'the False Among Us.' Pilferers of our bloodlines. These spawn of the Great Devourer silenced the voices of several of my people's enclaves. Their stinging bites steal souls just as their flesh steals the shapes of the nobler races. Abominations!"

traits.locale_text: “我们称它们为‘伪型’，它们会掠夺我们的血脉。那些大吞噬者的后裔，已经让我们好几个族群永远陷入沉寂之中。它们刺痛的啃咬会窃取灵魂，而它们邪恶的躯体会拟态成高贵种族的外形。真是一群令人作呕的怪物！”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Wir nennen sie 'die Falschen unter uns'. Diebe unserer Blutlinie. Diese Brut des Großen Verschlingers hat die Stimmen mehrerer Enklaven meines Volkes verstummen lassen. Ihre stechenden Bisse stehlen Seelen, genau wie ihr Fleisch die Gestalt der edleren Spezies stiehlt. Abscheulichkeiten!"
languages.original_text: "We call them 'the False Among Us.' Pilferers of our bloodlines. These spawn of the Great Devourer silenced the voices of several of my people's enclaves. Their stinging bites steal souls just as their flesh steals the shapes of the nobler races. Abominations!"

traits.locale_text: "Wir nennen sie 'die Falschen unter uns'. Diebe unserer Blutlinie. Diese Brut des Großen Verschlingers hat die Stimmen mehrerer Enklaven meines Volkes verstummen lassen. Ihre stechenden Bisse stehlen Seelen, genau wie ihr Fleisch die Gestalt der edleren Spezies stiehlt. Abscheulichkeiten!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Los llamamos "Los Impostores". Ladrones de nuestra estirpe. Estos vástagos del Gran Devorador silenciaron las voces de mi gente en varios de sus enclaves. Sus afiladas dentaduras arrebatan almas al igual que su carne roba las formas de las razas más nobles. ¡Seres abominables!».
languages.original_text: "We call them 'the False Among Us.' Pilferers of our bloodlines. These spawn of the Great Devourer silenced the voices of several of my people's enclaves. Their stinging bites steal souls just as their flesh steals the shapes of the nobler races. Abominations!"

traits.locale_text: «Los llamamos "Los Impostores". Ladrones de nuestra estirpe. Estos vástagos del Gran Devorador silenciaron las voces de mi gente en varios de sus enclaves. Sus afiladas dentaduras arrebatan almas al igual que su carne roba las formas de las razas más nobles. ¡Seres abominables!».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「我々は奴らを『同血の紛い物』と呼んでいる。我が血統の盗人だ。このグレート・ディヴァウアーの子孫達は、いくつかの我が民の領土の口を封じたのだ。奴らの肉体がお上品な種族の姿形を奪うように、あの突き刺すような噛みつき方で魂を奪う。実に忌まわしい！」
languages.original_text: "We call them 'the False Among Us.' Pilferers of our bloodlines. These spawn of the Great Devourer silenced the voices of several of my people's enclaves. Their stinging bites steal souls just as their flesh steals the shapes of the nobler races. Abominations!"

traits.locale_text: 「我々は奴らを『同血の紛い物』と呼んでいる。我が血統の盗人だ。このグレート・ディヴァウアーの子孫達は、いくつかの我が民の領土の口を封じたのだ。奴らの肉体がお上品な種族の姿形を奪うように、あの突き刺すような噛みつき方で魂を奪う。実に忌まわしい！」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Onlara 'Aramızdaki Sahte' deriz. Soyumuzun hırsızları. Büyük Yutucu'nun bu yaratıkları, halkımın birçok bölgesinin sesini susturmuştur. İğneli ısırıkları ruhları çalar. Bedenleri... Kendilerinden çok daha asil ırkların biçimini... Ucubeler!"
languages.original_text: "We call them 'the False Among Us.' Pilferers of our bloodlines. These spawn of the Great Devourer silenced the voices of several of my people's enclaves. Their stinging bites steal souls just as their flesh steals the shapes of the nobler races. Abominations!"
